p: Studies were carried out to investigate the in vitro anti-inflammatory activity of the isolated compounds of the n-hexane and EtOAc extract of M. griffithii Dunn on LPS-induced NO production in RAW 264.7 cell, where, griffinone B showed the best activity. Further, it was selected for the evaluation of iNOS and COX-2 expression with 1400Â W and revealed the suppression of iNOS protein and mRNA as the positive control ( Tang et al., 2016).
